column5: There was someone here that was replacing thier used bow mount and I had a conversation about taking the used one off his hands.  Hope this person reads this.
Was it Ron, Brian? He sold his.
Nope,  Ah I remember now it was zman. Man how the brain works.LOL
Not to worry Brian...it's not the memory that goes first...  It's the "stream" !!!
Hi Brian it was me My dad will be home with the boat tomorrow from storage and I just picked up the new motor On Monday I will be PM you with the specifics on the Motor
Ah thanks bud.  All those that said Im getting old.............................................................   to you. LOL
